ygData.subject: Re: Learning Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah, excellent :) thanks for the info. Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard ... From: Bob Thurston  To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
Ah, excellent :) thanks for the info.


Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard
-----Original Message-----
From: Bob Thurston <bthursto@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, April 17, 1999 3:02 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Learning Languages


You don't need to be in a group. me and another wizard increased our lang while on the boat.. we used /tell and were not grouped but my skill in the lang he was speaking went up to below average from awfull :) I changed a social hot button so we both totally spamed each other with giberish text but it worked well

Retro- High Elf Wizard Mithaniel Marr

Chris Trubiani wrote:

You increase skill in languages by listening to your group talk that language. You cannot improve by speaking, only listening. And I'm fairly sure you have to be in a group. Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard
-----Original Message-----
From: A.J. Campo <campo@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, April 17, 1999 8:23 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Learning LanguagesHow does one increase skill in languages to which one point has been added in the skill window? Thank you.
